channel.title: [Neutral killer] The Scourge
channel.description:
>**The Scoruge** _(passive)_ **Relentless** you become immune to occupation after the first time. Once you are occupy immune, the next 2 times someone tries to occupy you they will think it was successful. _(passive)_ **Paranoid** Immune to death. In addition, you will be informed of the names of everyone who visits you. _(Night, infinite uses)_ **Stalk** Learn the names of everyone who visits your target. If no one visits the target, you will kill them. _(Night, infinite uses, 1-day cooldown)_ **Manslaughter** Kill your target.
Goal: NK goal

item.title: [Neutral killer] The Scourge
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
yes that is what I said.

Now keep in mind that he doesn’t have as good a death immunity as the other classes; reaper and possessor can survive bleeding and poison, but not this guy. Not only that, but he has no way of dealing with death immune enemies.

Read full topic

item.title: [Neutral killer] The Scourge
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
-stalk prince
-stalk / use charge murder ability on prince visitors

  • stalk prince

Read full topic

item.title: [Neutral killer] The Scourge
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
I don’t know what you are saying but this is how the class would play it.

-stalk prince-
-pick off everyone who visited prince-
-eventually kill prince-

Read full topic

item.title: [Neutral killer] The Scourge
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
I was suggesting a limited charge “kill this dude” ability. Afterall, OT fan just try to kill visitors and find the healers etc.

Read full topic

item.title: [Neutral killer] The Scourge
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
either let it kill every night, or let it kill twice every other night
if you want it to be weaker, let it kill twice every other night, as that has a higher chance of one of the targets being healed/jailed/observed/etc.

Read full topic

item.title: [Neutral killer] The Scourge
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Moleland:

Hmm, I’m not sure it needs ability that powerful, as it hides from knights and doesn’t trigger healers, and observers don’t spot it killing.

It doesn’t do any of that when double killing, ant remember that ANY CLASS that visits their target will stop the death.

It needs to be able to kill regularly, but if it is OP, I can make it a 3 day cool down

Read full topic

item.description:
yes same as assassin’s double kill thing but infinite uses and 2 day cool down

item.title: [Neutral killer] The Scourge
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
The Scoruge
(passive) Relentless
you become immune to occupation after the first time. Once you are occupy immune, the next 2 times someone tries to occupy you they will think it was successful.
(passive) Paranoid
Immune to death. In addition, you will be informed of the names of everyone who visits you.
(Night, infinite uses) Stalk
Learn the names of everyone who visits your target. If no one visits the target, you will kill them.
(Night, infinite uses, 1-day cooldown) Manslaughter
Kill your target.

Goal: NK goal
